sub_title: Architect | Commerce, Experience & Marketing Cloud Practice Lead NL at Accenture
summary:
With an extensive international experience and success in various roles, my problem-solving personality looks to solve business issues in a pragmatic sense - if you don't do it right, don't do it.
I want to help customers push the envelope on how they engage with customers, and don't think it should be just focused on just one aspect (an app, an email), but rather how different roles such as service, commerce, sales and Marketing can benefit from a holistic customer view, where data is seen as the foundation to maintaining and building the relationship.

What motivates me?
Learning is my number one motivator and I hope it always will be. Learning should not only be in the classroom though, and I feel like learning from what to avoid is as effective as learning what to do. It is this double sided approach which motivates me to put myself in and succeed in challenging and changing environments. 
Change. I have found working in environments where change is happening often forces people to be open to other ideas and breaks down walls. Change is an opportunity for me not only a risk.
Everyone says that honesty is important, but for me it is imperative. While we don’t always like what we hear, it is important to know, after all, feedback is the start of improvement. Having an open dialogue in the workplace has built trust for me and where there is trust there is the ability to focus on results and not on the roadblocks along the way.

projects.title: Sharepoint Migration and Implementation
projects.description:
The current on-demand method of dealing with requests for material and information sharing via email is increasingly difficult due to growing numbers of distributors and products, the changing regulatory environment and the importance of corporate guideline compliance. 
Sharepoint will, therefore, be used to provide a central location for distributors to access product information, marketing materials, product images and videos as well as provide a location for communication and discussion of ideas between distributors. 
This has involved
- Analysis of requirements and capabilities of distributors
- Development of an information management strategy (what is provided, when, to whom and in what format)
- Design of a Sharepoint structure/interface allowing distributors to find the required information/data without the need to contact the Export Team.

contributors.headline: Architect | Commerce, Experience & Marketing Cloud Practice Lead NL at Accenture

projects.title: Risk Management Reporting Process
projects.description:
Redesign of Risk Reporting Process within Vorwerk Group, within the existing guidelines from Senior Management. This can be considered in 3 parts
1) Redesign to Collection and Summarisation of reports to automate most of the process (via VBA Macros) and reduce manual effort which is currently extensive
2) Improve existing Reports and Macros to consider wider and International Use. Currently localisation in Germany has limited use outside of German Markets. Ensuring that data integrity is handled correctly is also important given wider use of tool (e.g. consistent numbering and change-analysis).
3) Develop a new Reporting concept which should more systematically and consistenty present risks in a manner which enables quick recognition of problems and clear understanding of the underlying issues.

contributors.headline: Architect | Commerce, Experience & Marketing Cloud Practice Lead NL at Accenture

projects.title: Treasury Software Implementation
projects.description:
Project Work covering various aspects of Treasury Software implmentation in preparation for SEPA deadline in 2014.
1) Process Design: Developing processes related to use and implementation of the Treasury Software including user rights profiles, Support process and Handbook development
2) Requirements confirmity: Provide support for decisions on:
   - Payments format specificatons: SWIFT, ISO 20022 XML, SEPA, CGI and Legacy National Standards
   - Bank co-operation: Support strategic consolidation of banks, and assess ability of banks of match our internal requirements
   - Roll-out to other subsidiaries: Consideration of current process, IT (SAP), and demand environments
   - Auditing/Security compliance
3) Software Testing: Testing user experience and payment functionalities, along with Bug Reporting and Tracking.
4) Support for Roll-Out: Setup and train new users once Go-Live has been completed
5) Project Tracking: Tracking of tasks required to be completed and decisions made to reduce misunderstandings between colleagues and external partners and speed up implementation process.

projects.title: Program Reporting and Controlling Process
projects.description:
Development of Excel Tool for management level to improve reporting accuracy and tracking. 
Using the internal SAP systems and Macros, the tool would download, add, summarise and compare data with the aims of:
1) Reducing inconsistency where there were increasing inconsistencies due to constant changing environement
2) Track submission of reporting data
3) Track project progress
4) Provide a financial and progress overview for all programs being worked on in the relevant board area.

projects.title: Project Management Process Development and Design
projects.description: Process redesigns in the area of Project Management for Strategic Programs at SAP. Goal to simplify and standardise process and tools used in order to improve scalability of approach and decrease lead in times for new Project Managers and Assistants. Tools were updated to match changes in software and company process and various aspects were automated to reduce inconsistencies and human error.

profile_positions.description:
- Commerce, Experience & Marketing Cloud Practice Lead
Responsible for leading the Dutch team in Commerce and Marketing topics including team training, project staffing, business development. Interface with both Salesforce and internal Accenture stakeholders to develop a strong local capability.

- Technical Architect
Implementation of complex multi-cloud Salesforce solutions including B2B Commerce, Marketing, Experience Cloud alongside more traditional Salesforce products like Sales and Service Cloud. Engage with enterprise architecture teams at enterprise level clients to develop future architecture blueprints and define the role of Salesforce among other products such as Azure, AWS, SAP, Google Cloud Platform and various middleware solutions.

- Europe Technical Lead for Salesforce Data Driven Experience
Work with Salesforce on development of Marketing Cloud and B2C Architecture certifications.
Develop and build relationships with Salesforce Product Teams to influence and provide experience-based input on product roadmaps.
Support Accenture teams globally to understand future demand trends, strategic vision on Innovation and support in SME cross-Europeans staffing.

Technical SME

RFPs/Proposals
